futures_wheel_highlights.title: SpaceX-xAI Merger
first_order_impacts: Consolidation of AI compute + space infrastructure under single entity
Valuation reshaping of private tech sector
second_order_impacts: Regulatory scrutiny of concentrated AI-space power
New competitive dynamics for cloud providers
National security implications of private space-AI monopoly

futures_wheel_highlights.title: Notepad++ Supply Chain Attack
first_order_impacts: Loss of trust in open-source software update channels
second_order_impacts: Accelerated adoption of code signing and SBOM requirements
Potential new software supply chain regulations

futures_wheel_highlights.title: Quantum Repeater Breakthrough
first_order_impacts: Potential obsolescence of current encryption standards timeline accelerated

futures_wheel_highlights.title: US Paris Agreement Exit
first_order_impacts: Removal of world's second-largest emitter from climate governance framework
second_order_impacts: Other nations may reduce own climate commitments
Increased role for non-state actors in climate action
Clean energy investment uncertainty in US market
